resources.string: InSight assists the visually impaired in their daily lives, leading to an overall better quality of life.
The Text-to-Speech mode allows users to receive audio feedback of words that they cannot see.
The Barcode Scanner mode provides the user with audio feedback based on the barcode or QR code that was scanned.
The Facial Recognition mode provides the user with audio feedback of the individuals around them.
Hey! Check out this amazing app called InSight. https://chriscsykes.github.io/InSight/
InSight is an Android application aimed at improving the quality of life of the visually impaired. Using CameraX and Google Firebase, this app helps the visually impaired by providing features like:
Created by Sylvester Coch, Sebastian Saker, and Christopher Sykes
Icon made by Icongeek26 from www.flaticon.com.

- Firebase authentication via speech 
 
 - Audio feedback on button presses using Google's text to speech engine 
 
 - Text recognition for short texts and documents using Firebase ML Kit's text recognition API 
 
 - And more
For more info please visit https://github.com/chriscsykes/InSight or email us at InSightApp@gmail.com
Open the app, and spell out your name when prompted to.
Once logged in, swipe the bottom of the screen and press down to determine which feature you are on.
Once you have selected the desired feature, position the camera appropriately and tap the screen to begin. Hold the phone steady while the camera takes in the image to be processed.

To call for support, listen to the tutorial, provide feedback, learn more about InSight, or share this app with a friend, swipe inward from the right edge of the screen, or press the help button in the top right corner of screen to access the navigation view.
Tap the middle of your screen to call
